refs: Danny got the Radiance website up again, after a month or so downtime to
rebuild the system after a break-in.  Do you want to post something
about it on the distribution list?
NB:  radiance-online.org  had been absent for some days as well,
since our provider had some technical problems. sorry for that,
looks like we're up and running fairly stable now. No emails were
lost, as far as I checked.
subject: radsite is up againDate: Fri, 05 Oct 2001 12:03:48 -0700
body:
-------- Original Message -------- Reply-To: gward@lmi.net To: Peter Apian-Bennewitz
 I am trying to calculate glazing transmssivity for window glass with a measured transmittance of 0.44. I have tried to use the formula on the rayfront website http://www.schorsch.com/rayfront/manual/dielectricdef.html but keep on getting a strange answer 0f -320. Does anyone know if this formula is correct or how to calculate transmissivity?
Cheers
Ben Masters
